channel.title: Types on INFINI Pizza
channel.description: Recent content in Types on INFINI Pizza

item.title: Type Parameter
item.description: Type Parameter # analyzer: the analyzer used for indexing search_analyzer: the analyzer used for searching index_options: controls what information is added to the inverted index, available options are: docs: Only the doc number is indexed. Can answer the question Does this term exist in this field? freqs: Doc number and term frequencies are indexed. Term frequencies are used to score repeated terms higher than single terms.
